DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether specific Micro-RNA expression profiles are related to Prostate cancer outcome.
DOC.brief_title: Micro-RNA Expression Profiles in High Risk Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients with clinically localised high risk prostate cancer (cT>2, bx GS >7, PSA >20 ng/ml) scheduled for radical prostatectomy. Non high risk prostate cancer
